mapper.insert: INSERT INTO booking(bseq, rseq, email, ckindate, ckoutdate, price, payment, status) VALUES(#{bseq}, #{resq}, #{email}, #{ckindate}, #{ckoutdate}, #{price}, #{payment}, #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT distinct(bseq) FROM booking_view WHERE email=#{email} AND status LIKE '%'||#{status}||'%' ORDER BY bseq DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE booking SET status=1 WHERE bseq=#{bseq}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM booking ORDER BY bseq DESC
